title: Mario Mutsch - Wikipedia
snippet: On 16 July 2009, it was announced that Mutsch had signed for French Ligue 2 side FC Metz on a free transfer. In 2011, he joined Swiss side FC Sion for only one season and in 2012 he moved on to FC St.
